captions.text:
(Ace) 'Meeting in the middle of the desert
alWays made me nervous. It's a scary place.
'I kneW about the holes in the desert

'and everyWhere I looked,
there could have been a hole.

'Normally, my prospects of comin' back alive
from a meetin' With Nicky Were 99 out of 100.

'But this time, When I heard him say,
"a couple of hundred yards doWn the road,"
'I gave myself 50-50.'

Where the fuck you get off
talkin' to people about me behind my back?

- What people?
- You think I Wasn't gonna find out?
What are you talkin' about?

You said I'm bringin' heat on you.
I gotta listen to people because of your shit?

You're orderin' me out?
You better get your oWn fuckin' army.

I didn't order anybody. I told Andy Stone
that you had heat and that Was a problem.

You Want me to get out of
my oWn fuckin' toWn?

Let the bullshit bloW over
so I can run the casino.

Anything goes Wrong With the casino,
it's my ass. It's not yours.

I don't knoW Whether you knoW but you
only have your fuckin' casino because of me.

I'm What counts out here. Not your fuckin'
country clubs or your fuckin' TV shoWs.

And What the fuck
are you doin' on TV anyhoW?

I get calls from home every day.
They think you Went batshit.

I'm only on TV because I gotta be able
to hang around the casino. Come on.

You could have had the food and beverage
job Without goin' on TV!

- You Wanted to go on TV.
- Yeah, I did.

That Way I have a forum.
I can fight back.

They knoW they can't fuck around With me
like they could if I Was an unknoWn.
You're makin' a spectacle of yourself.

Me? I Wouldn't even be in this situation
if it Wasn't for you.

Every time I meet somebody,
the question is do I knoW you?

- NoW you Wanna blame your license on me?
- No, Nicky.

When you asked me
if you could come out here,
What did I tell you? Do you remember?

- Back up a fuckin' minute.
- Do you remember What I told you?

I asked you? When the fuck did I ever ask you
if I could come out here?

- Get this through your head...
- You never?

...you JeW motherfucker, you. You only exist out
here because of me. That's the only reason.
Without me, you personally,

every fuckin' Wise guy still around
Will take a piece of your fuckin' JeW ass.

Then Where you gonna go?
You're fuckin' Warned.

Don't go over my head again,
you motherfucker, you.
(Car door slams, tires screech)
(# Devo: Whip It)

this show.

comments.author: jhon doe

comments.text:
Too right, there, mate... Nicky was a total cunt... Apologies if you all 
ready know this, but I watched a great documentary about the real-life 
mobsters these boys, and 'Casino' is based on... and gotta say, Joe 
Pesci was a perfect perfect choice to play Nicky... Nicky was based on a 
fella called Tony Spilotro... He was so short, like Joe Pesci, and just as 
insane as Nicky.. the documentary stated that Tony and his brother were 
beaten to near-death, and buried alive in a cornfield like in Casino, but 
the beatings took place in a underground garage not the cornfield, and then 
Tony and his brother were driven to the cornfield and buried alive... 
Spilotro / Nicky was evil, and like you said, got what was coming.

comments.text:
It's pretty interesting as to how Scorsese filmed this from a visual 
perspective, as he shows a low angel shot over De Niro, who's obviously the 
defendant and the weak one in this scene, and Pesci, who's the aggressor 
and dominant one, despite their obvious height differences. Who would have 
thought that the shorter person would have been the opposer in a fearful 
way? All hail Joe Pesci.﻿

comments.author: Mac11 92

comments.text:
1.  Ace is actually correct in this scene, and Nicky was getting way out of 
line.  It's why the bosses decided to whack him.  Nicky did not make Ace's 
casino possible--the bosses did.  Ace had the casino before Nicky came out 
to Vegas.   
2.  Joe Pesci is one of the two greatest "cussers" in the world; the other 
being Samuel L. Jackson. 
 ﻿
comments.author: dmreeoogdaq

comments.text:
+Brett G Ace was more than justified. IRL, Spilotro's job was to make sure 
of the skim on the casinos Rosenthal controlled. His other activities were 
strictly freelance, and as far as the real bosses back in Chicago were 
concerned they drew WAY too much attention to what was going on. That's 
what ultimately did him in. Had he taken Rosenthal's advice here, he'd have 
lived longer.

Rosenthal was smarter. He died of natural causes.
comments.author: Lytrigian

comments.text:
+dmreeoogdaq Right or wrong Nicky was reminding him he was a "made guy" & 
boss of Vegas. Ace (even tho justified) would have ended up dead if it was 
anyone else he was fucking with.
comments.author: Brett G

comments.text:
+NocturneKing Yeah, but the bosses could have sent almost any muscle out 
there to do Nicky's job. Ace was a unique talent.
comments.author: Lytrigian

comments.text:
+NocturneKing Oh yeah...in reality both Ace and Nicky got out of control.  
I mean, Ace was walking around with a cigarette holder & a pink robe "like 
fuckin' John Barrymore".  I love this film because it's about two guys who 
get the world of Vegas basically handed to them, and they manage to blow it 
all to hell (literally, in the case of Ace's car).
